lead_paragraph: Investors were weighing the latest batch of company earnings and looking ahead to testimony before Congress by the Fed chairwoman, Janet L. Yellen

headline.print_headline: Wall St. Slips as Markets Abroad Fall
headline.main: Wall St. Ends Down Slightly in a Zigzag Day
